item.title: 随着需求激增，三菱重工将把燃气轮机产能增加一倍
item.description: 三菱重工株式会社（Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd.）的目标是在未来两年内将其燃气轮机产能翻一番，因为全球对这种设备的需求因替换和数据中心需求而增加。【原文：Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd. aims to double its gas turbine capacity in the next two years as demand for the equipment rises globally due to replacement and data center needs.】

item.title: 加密货币找到进入澳大利亚 28 亿澳元养老金账户的通道
item.description: 澳大利亚 4.3 万亿澳元（约合 2.8 万亿美元）的退休制度— 长期以来一直被视为世界上监管最严格的储蓄池之一— 正在成为加密货币的新领域。【原文：Australia’s A$4.3 trillion ($2.8 trillion) retirement system — long regarded as one of the world’s best-regulated savings pools — is emerging as a new frontier for crypto.】

item.title: 受迫害的泰国亲民主党有望成为国王的缔造者
item.description: 泰国一个支持民主的政党在上台之初一直受到该国保守势力的阻挠，如今却突然占据了任命下一任总理的有利位置。【原文：A Thai pro-democracy party whose rise to power has been thwarted by the country’s conservative establishment is suddenly in pole position to anoint its next prime minister.】

item.title: 捷克计划增加国防开支，弥补 140 亿美元赤字
item.description: 捷克政府提议增加明年的国家预算赤字，因为财政保守的政府计划增加国防和一个大型能源项目的开支。【原文：The Czech government is proposing to increase the state budget deficit next year as the fiscally-conservative administration plans to boost spending on defense and a major energy project.】

item.title: TPC 称休斯顿工厂停电引发火灾
item.description: TPC 集团通过地区紧急警报系统发布消息称，休斯顿地区一家工厂停电导致燃烧，并有可能产生黑烟。【原文：TPC Group says a loss of power at a Houston-area plant has caused flaring and has the potential for black smoke, according to a post sent via a regional emergency alert system.】

item.title: 泰国王宫称公主血液感染情况好转
item.description: 泰国王室事务局表示，泰国公主巴拉吉蒂雅芭-纳伦迪拉-德比亚瓦蒂的血液感染情况有所好转，血压也趋于稳定。【原文：Thai Princess Bajrakitiyabha Narendira Debyavati’s bloodstream infection has improved and her blood pressure has stabilized, the Bureau of the Royal Household said.】

item.title: 法国发布南部雷暴和洪水警报
item.description: 法国南部多个地区发布雷暴和洪水黄色预警，迫使地中海地区的罗讷河口省将新学年开学时间推迟一天。【原文：France issued amber warnings for thunderstorms and floods in several southern regions, forcing the Mediterranean department of Bouches-du-Rhône to delay the start of the new school year by a day.】

item.title: 米斯里：习近平就深化印度关系提出四点建议
item.description: 一位印度高级官员说，中国国家主席习近平在周日与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的双边会晤中提出了深化两国关系的四项建议。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping, in his bilateral meeting with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday, made four suggestions to deepen ties between the two countries, a top Indian official said.】

item.title: 降息后澳大利亚房价连续第七个月攀升
item.description: 受借贷成本降低和大城市供应短缺的推动，澳大利亚房价连续第七个月上涨。【原文：Australian home prices advanced for a seventh straight month, fueled by lower borrowing costs and a supply shortfall in major cities.】

item.title: 股市命运取决于接下来的 14 个交易日
item.description: 未来几周，华尔街将清楚地看到，最近的股市涨势是会继续下去，还是注定要出轨。【原文：The next few weeks will give Wall Street a clear reading on whether this latest stock market rally will continue — or if it’s doomed to get derailed.】

item.title: 关税现实来袭，新兴市场的特朗普反弹面临风险
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二任总统任期伊始，与第一任总统一样，为新兴市场股市带来了利好，但鉴于他的贸易和财政政策也在拖累企业盈利，这轮反弹有可能耗尽能量。【原文：The start of Donald Trump’s second presidency has matched his first term in proving a boon for emerging-market stocks, but the rally risks running out of steam given his trade and fiscal policies are also sinking corporate earnings.】

item.title: 外卖司机之死引发对印尼精英的愤怒
item.description: 周四晚，阿凡-库尔尼亚万（Affan Kurniawan）在印度尼西亚首都送餐时被一群抗议者围住，手机掉在地上，他跪在地上捡起手机。【原文：Caught up in a crowd of protesters while delivering food in Indonesia’s capital on Thursday night, Affan Kurniawan dropped his mobile phone and knelt down to pick it up.】

item.title: 中国房屋销售低迷持续，房价继续下跌
item.description: 尽管房价有所下降，而且中国最大的两个城市推出了额外的刺激措施，但中国 8 月份的房屋销售仍延续了下滑态势。【原文：China’s home sales extended their slump in August even as prices declined and the country’s two biggest cities rolled out additional stimulus measures.】

item.title: 南非央行寻求向非银行开放支付系统：新闻 24
item.description: 据 News24 周日报道，南非储备银行的目标是在明年上半年完成允许非银行进入国家支付系统的提案，结束商业贷款机构的垄断地位。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank aims to complete proposals to give non-banks access to the national payments system in the first half of next year, ending commercial lenders’ monopoly hold, News24 reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 马科斯在洪水交易丑闻后任命新公共工程主管
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）已任命文斯-迪松（Vince Dizon）为公共工程与公路部负责人，接替因防洪项目争议而辞职的曼努埃尔-博诺安（Manuel Bonoan）。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has appointed Vince Dizon to head the Department of Public Works and Highways, replacing Manuel Bonoan who quit amid controversies over flood-control projects.】

item.title: 赫尔辛基新闻报》称欧洲央行行长雷恩认为存在通胀放缓风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）告诉芬兰报纸《赫尔辛基新闻报》，目前通胀发展的不确定性要求决策具有 "灵活性"。【原文：Current uncertainty over inflation developments calls for “flexibility” in policy-making, European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn told Finnish newspaper Helsingin Sanomat.】

item.title: 印尼骚乱升级，普拉博沃呼吁采取坚决行动
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）下令警方和军方对非法行为采取坚决行动。此前，印尼因生活费用上涨和不平等问题连续数日举行暴力抗议活动，造成至少三人死亡、建筑物被烧毁、官员住宅遭洗劫。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto ordered the police and military to take firm action against unlawful acts, following days of violent protests over rising living costs and inequality that have left at least three people dead, buildings torched, and officials’ homes looted.】

item.title: 印尼将取消引发抗议的议员津贴
item.description: 印尼议会将取消高额津贴，并暂停议员出国访问，这些都是震撼这个东南亚国家的一周抗议活动中的热点。【原文：The Indonesian parliament will revoke hefty allowances and place a moratorium on overseas visits by lawmakers, which were flash points in the week of protests that have rocked the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 印尼、泰国股市前景受政治风险影响
item.description: 印尼愈演愈烈的抗议活动和泰国领导层的最新动荡正在加剧这两个东南亚最大新兴股票市场的政治风险。【原文：Intensifying protests in Indonesia and the latest leadership upheaval in Thailand are ratcheting up political risk in the two largest emerging stock markets in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 德国天然气储备达到关键的 70% 临界值，缓解冬季风险
item.description: 德国已提前两个月将天然气储备装满至临界储存水平，从而缓解了人们对冬季供暖短缺的担忧，而这种担忧最近才引发了关于政府可能进行干预的讨论。【原文：Germany has filled its gas reserves to a critical storage level two months ahead of schedule, easing fears about winter heating shortages that only recently fueled talk of potential government intervention.】

item.title: 尽管美国减免关税，中国工厂活动仍持续低迷
item.description: 由于政府打击价格战导致生产受阻，抵消了美国延长贸易休战对制造商的提振作用，中国 8 月份的工厂活动仍处于萎缩状态。【原文：China’s factory activity remained stuck in contraction in August, as a government crackdown on price wars holds back production offset the boost for manufacturers of the US’ extended trade truce.】

item.title: Evertec 的 Sinqia 遭到网络攻击，巴西汇丰银行等受到影响
item.description: 据《O Globo》报道，黑客周五入侵了 Evertec 旗下的金融技术提供商 Sinqia，试图从包括汇丰控股公司本地业务在内的多家巴西金融机构窃取约 4.2 亿雷亚尔（约合 7740 万美元）。【原文：Hackers on Friday broke into Sinqia, a financial technology provider owned by Evertec, attempting to steal around 420 million reais ($77.4 million) from several Brazilian financial institutions including HSBC Holdings Plc’s local operations, O Globo reported.】

item.title: 期权市场对中国股市上涨持怀疑态度
item.description: 虽然在香港交易的中国股票连续第四个月攀升，但衍生品赌注显示投资者对市场持怀疑态度。【原文：While Chinese stocks traded in Hong Kong climbed for a fourth straight month, derivatives wagers show investors are skeptical about the market.】

item.title: 飞轮 "失灵，比特币代理公司总裁寻求资金修复
item.description: 西蒙-格罗维奇（Simon Gerovich）把一个陷入困境的日本酒店经营者变成了比特币囤积者和投资者的宠儿，他也感受到了热度。【原文：Simon Gerovich, who turned a struggling Japanese hotelier into a Bitcoin stockpiler and investor darling, is feeling the heat.】

item.title: 软银和乐天利用日本蓬勃发展的零售业对债券的需求
item.description: 面向日本普通投资者的公司债券销售正在蓬勃发展，有望超过去年的记录，因为更大的回报吸引了那些希望保护自己的储蓄不受通货膨胀影响的买家。【原文：Sales of corporate bonds to Japan’s mom and pop investors are booming, on track to surpass last year’s record as bigger returns draw buyers looking to protect their savings from inflation.】

item.title: 美联储会议临近，美国就业增长预期温和
item.description: 8 月份，美国雇主招聘工人的热情不高，失业率可能升至近四年来的新高，进一步证明劳动力市场更加低迷。【原文：Employers in the US showed little enthusiasm to take on workers during August, and the unemployment rate probably ticked up to an almost four-year high, adding to evidence of a more subdued labor market.】

item.title: 埃利奥特建议以 58.9 亿美元收购 Citgo
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家附属公司成为法院下令拍卖 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的推荐竞标者，出价 58.9 亿美元，并达成了一项向资产抵押的债券持有人还款的协议。【原文：An Elliott Investment Management affiliate emerged as the recommended bidder in the court-ordered auction of Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent, offering $5.89 billion and a deal to pay off bondholders that have a pledge on the asset.】

item.title: 美国贸易伙伴在关税法庭败诉后 "茫然失措
item.description: 在联邦上诉法院裁定根据紧急状态法非法征收关税之后，唐纳德-特朗普总统全球关税的法律之争正在加深，从而扩大了全球贸易的混乱局面。【原文：The legal fight over President Donald Trump’s global tariffs is deepening after a federal appeals court ruled the levies were issued illegally under an emergency law, extending the chaos in global trade.】

item.title: 美国精神航空公司破产，为求生存惨痛裁员
item.description: 精神航空控股公司（Spirit Aviation Holdings Inc.【原文：Spirit Aviation Holdings Inc.’s second bankruptcy filing in a year signals that the low-cost carrier is finally facing up to the painful steps needed to ensure its survival.】

item.title: 1 万亿美元交易激增，美国企业杠杆率有望上升
item.description: 美国公司准备提高债务水平，以帮助为 1 万亿美元的收购浪潮提供资金，这是在多年缩减借贷规模后的一次逆转。【原文：US companies are poised to boost their debt levels to help fund a $1 trillion wave of acquisitions, a reversal after years of scaling back their borrowings.】
